properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 1 at 10:36AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Tallahatchie River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Tallahatchie River at Locopolis
* from Friday, January 3, until further notice.
* At 10 AM Wednesday the stage was...29.7 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 33.6 feet on Saturday, January 4.
* Flood stage is 33.0 feet.
* Forecast to remain steady through tonight then begin rising
Thursday afternoon. The river is forecast to rise above flood
stage Friday afternoon with a crest near 33.6 feet Friday evening.
At 34.0 feet, Widespread farm land flooding is occurring in Quitman
and Tallahatchie Counties.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
